creditline: Gift of Anson Bailey Cutts Jr., in memory of Mrs. Edna B. Cutts
description: Tobacco Pouch and Netsuke, ca. 1880; Pouch in blue looped silk with design in greys and browns, silver dragon mounting; netsuke of ivory with inlaid silver dragon; netsuke attached by silver chain.
title: Tobacco Pouch and Netsuke
